title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models, packaged as a lightweight Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Community Java SDK for Ollama, published to Maven Central, supporting sync/async and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing a simple client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced community CLI for Ollama written in Rust, offering coloured output and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that bridges GitHub Copilot chat to a local Ollama model for private AI assistance.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library (Hex package) wrapping the Ollama REST API with GenServer-based process management.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Community Dart/Flutter package enabling mobile and desktop apps to talk to Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for building and running Ollama on NixOS with optional CUDA and ROCm accelerators.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a private AI assistant sidebar powered by a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models as Slack slash commands and threaded chats.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama, distributed via NuGet, supporting .NET 6+ and streaming completions.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module that spins up an AWS EC2 GPU instance with Ollama pre-installed and model caching on EFS.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for niche and fine-tuned models.
